org.gvsig.raster.roi

Class AbstractROI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.raster.roi.AbstractROI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ROI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RasterROI, VectorialROIImpl

    public abstract class AbstractROI
extends java.lang.Object
implements ROI
    Clase que representa las Regiones de Interes.
